title: MemberDetailsConfig
description: Configuration regarding the "member(s)" of the entry

asLinks.description: Show members as links to each member detailed page. @default false

shortMember.description: If false the each member will be shown as the full distinguishedName, else only the name will be shown. @default false

show.description: Wether or not to show the "member(s)" of the entry in the details view. If false "shortMember" will be ignored @default true
